About the Series:

Lewis is as a spin-off from Inspector Morse. Like that series, it was set primarily in Oxford. Kevin Whately
reprised his character Robbie Lewis, who had been Morse's sergeant in the original series. 
Lewis had now been promoted to detective inspector and was assisted by DS James Hathaway, portrayed 
by Laurence Fox.


Thank you for your kind comments and thumbs ups on my other torrents, your feedback is welcome.



Consists of 3 x 90 min Episodes.


I hope you enjoy.
